column4: i am trying to install NVIDIA-Linux-x86-169.09-pkg1.run....do i take off the run part or what do i do?
Its best to use the packaged drivers, however, there are instructions on nvidia's website for installing from their package ('sudo sh [FILENAME]')
i have an 8800gtx card and the nvidia accelerator for ubuntu sometimes crashes when playing games on wine
Do you have the newest wine packages (they have a repo of their own for the latest)
